Dexter Tiah, Founder at Whatcard.sgLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 20 Jun 2019Its mostly a price/market risk. One way to look at is to see how low both the impact of both the price of the asset and the fx rate gets hit during a crisis/stressed situation. The additional decline (as compared to a similar asset locally) would be attributable to the fx risk0 comments0
